description: A React component named AuthForm that handles user sign-up and sign-in processes via Supabase authentication. It manages form state, handles authentication requests, and toggles between sign-up and sign-in modes.

methods.name: AuthForm({ onAuth })
methods.description: React functional component that provides a form for user authentication, supporting both sign-up and sign-in modes with Supabase.

methods.name: handleAuth
methods.description: Asynchronous handler function for form submission that performs sign-up or sign-in based on the current mode, and manages error handling and UI state.
